meanings.definition: A lively dance in triple time.
meanings.sent1: The children performed joyful gigues at the school talent show.
meanings.sent2: The gigues at the party had everyone tapping their feet to the beat.
meanings.sent3: During the gigues, the clumsy cat tried to join in with its own funny dance.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a gigues, filling it with energy.
meanings.sent5: The gigues swirled around the room, leaving a trail of happiness in its wake.

meanings.sent5: The gigues transported the audience back in time to the grandeur of the baroque era.
